title: Java Installation and Setup
description: Understand how to set up your computer to write and run Java programs using the Java Development Kit (JDK).

content.content:
# Imagine You Want to Start Building Apps 🚀

You need the proper setup to run Java code, much like needing a video player to watch movies.

## Why We Get Stuck Without Setup ⚠

Without a Java compiler and JVM, your computer *cannot understand Java code*.

## Introducing: Java Development Kit (JDK) 🛠

The JDK includes *everything*: compiler, JVM, libraries, and tools needed to write and run Java applications.

## Step-by-Step: Installing Java 📋

1. *Download the JDK* - Visit Oracle's website or use OpenJDK 📥
2. *Install it* - Follow the installation wizard 💻
3. *Set the PATH environment variable* - So your system can find Java commands 🔍
4. **Test using java -version** - Verify everything works ✅
